## Purpose

## Setup
Set working directory to project directory

### Check remotes

### Set SSH over HTTPS

usethis::git_remotes()

### Get project / repo name

```{r}
username <- 'symbiologist'
```

```{r}
repo <- basename(rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file())
repo
```
```{r}
ssh <- paste0('git@github.com:', username, '/', repo, '.git')
ssh
```


```{r}
usethis::use_git_remote(
  "origin",
  ssh,
  overwrite = TRUE
)

usethis::git_remotes()
```
